message.content:
Subject: Notification of Departure from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to leave [Company Name]. This was not an easy decision for me, as I have truly enjoyed my time here and have learned so much during my tenure. However, I feel that it is time for me to move on to new challenges and opportunities.

I want to thank you for the support and guidance you have provided me during my time at [Company Name]. Your leadership and mentorship have been invaluable, and I am grateful for the opportunity to have worked with such a talented and dedicated team.

My last day of work will be [Date]. I will do everything in my power to ensure a smooth transition and complete any outstanding tasks before my departure. If there is anything specific you would like me to focus on during this time, please let me know.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish the company all the best in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
